subject: Order #SSN4884
description_text:
Hello,

The tracking for this order once it reached the US went to the USPS tracking #9200190406975502247484 which shows that it was seized by the USPS because it was counterfeit and will be kept by them and not delivered.

I paid for express shipping which said 2 to 5 days. It has now been 13 days and it looks like I won't be getting it at all. My previous control box has stopped working and I need this quickly, as my pedals are completely useless without it. Is there any way you could ship me one with a more reliable and quicker service, such as Fedex or UPS?

Thanks,
Jay

conversations.body_text: Hi jay armstrong,  This control box is our own SIMSONN brand product and is manufactured by us. It is not a counterfeit item. We will contact USPS to confirm what documents or materials are required.
Hi jay armstrong,      Cleared through customs and released, awaiting final pickup and delivery.

If you go to the USPS tracking website and enter tracking #9200190406975502247484 you will see that it says the postage is counterfeit, not that your product is. It also says that it has been seized and will not be delivered. Did JS Express provide you with a USPS tracking number that is different from the one above?


________________________________

Hi jay armstrong,    This is your USPS link. It appears the items haven't been handed over to USPS yet, but they should be delivered to you within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9214490401712443046092

Hi jay armstrong,    I've noticed the package hasn't been delivered yet. It's highly likely it's been lost. We'll arrange for a replacement shipment as soon as possible. Here is your tracking number:  ​https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047222108358

I agree, thank you for staying in top of this.

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
